title: Canada retail e-commerce sales growth 2018 to 2023
summary: In general Year-over-year change has fallen over the Year.
Year-over-year change is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2021.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2020 and 2021.
Maximum Year-over-year change, about 10.1 was reported at Year 2019
Minimum Year-over-year change about 6.9 was reached at Year 2021
